title: BacklogItem
description: Unified backlog item with level discriminator. One schema for EPIC, FEATURE, and STORY.

id.description: Level-prefixed ID: E### for EPIC, F### for FEATURE, S### for STORY.

priority_score.description: Priority as integer. Higher = more important. Used for intra-tier ordering.

depends_on.description: IDs this item depends on. Empty array if no dependencies.

parent_id.description: Parent item ID. Null for EPICs. Required for FEATURE (must ref EPIC) and STORY (must ref FEATURE).
